Forasmuch<S>1895</S> as many<S>4183</S> have taken in hand<S>2021</S> to set forth in order<S>392</S> a declaration<S>1335</S> of<S>4012</S> those things<S>4229</S> which are most surely believed<S>4135</S> among<S>1722</S> us<S>2254</S>,
Even<S>2531</S> as they delivered<S>3860</S> them unto us<S>2254</S>, which<S>3588</S> from<S>575</S> the beginning<S>746</S> were<S>1096</S> eyewitnesses<S>845</S>, and<S>2532</S> ministers<S>5257</S> of the word<S>3056</S>;
It seemed<S>1380</S> good to me also<S>2504</S>, having had perfect<S>199</S> understanding<S>3877</S> of all things<S>3956</S> from the very first<S>509</S>, to write<S>1125</S> unto thee<S>4671</S> in order<S>2517</S>, most excellent<S>2903</S> Theophilus<S>2321</S>,
That<S>2443</S> thou mightest know<S>1921</S> the certainty<S>803</S> of<S>4012</S> those things<S>3056</S>, wherein<S>3739</S> thou hast been instructed<S>2727</S>.
There was<S>1096</S> in<S>1722</S> the days<S>2250</S> of Herod<S>2264</S>, the king<S>935</S> of Judaea<S>2449</S>, a certain<S>5100</S> priest<S>2409</S> named<S>3686</S> Zacharias<S>2197</S>, of<S>1537</S> the course<S>2183</S> of Abia<S>7</S>: and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> wife<S>1135</S> was of<S>1537</S> the daughters<S>2364</S> of Aaron<S>2</S>, and<S>2532</S> her<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> was Elisabeth<S>1665</S>.
And<S>1161</S> they were<S>2258</S> both<S>297</S> righteous<S>1342</S> before<S>1799</S> God<S>2316</S>, walking<S>4198</S> in<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> the commandments<S>1785</S> and<S>2532</S> ordinances<S>1345</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> blameless<S>273</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they<S>846</S> had<S>2258</S> no<S>3756</S> child<S>5043</S>, because<S>2530</S> that Elisabeth<S>1665</S> was<S>2258</S> barren<S>4723</S>, and<S>2532</S> they<S>846</S> both<S>297</S> were<S>2258</S> now well stricken<S>4260</S> in<S>1722</S> years<S>2250</S>.
And<S>1161</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, that while<S>1722</S> he<S>846</S> executed the priest's office<S>2407</S> before<S>1725</S> God<S>2316</S> in<S>1722</S> the order<S>5010</S> of his<S>846</S> course<S>2183</S>,
According<S>2596</S> to the custom<S>1485</S> of the priest's office<S>2405</S>, his lot<S>2975</S> was to burn incense<S>2370</S> when he went<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the temple<S>3485</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the whole<S>3956</S> multitude<S>4128</S> of the people<S>2992</S> were<S>2258</S> praying<S>4336</S> without<S>1854</S> at the time<S>5610</S> of incense<S>2368</S>.
And<S>1161</S> there appeared<S>3700</S> unto him<S>846</S> an angel<S>32</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> standing<S>2476</S> on<S>1537</S> the right side<S>1188</S> of the altar<S>2379</S> of incense<S>2368</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when Zacharias<S>2197</S> saw<S>1492</S> him, he was troubled<S>5015</S>, and<S>2532</S> fear<S>5401</S> fell<S>1968</S> upon<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> the angel<S>32</S> said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, Fear<S>5399</S> not<S>3361</S>, Zacharias<S>2197</S>: for<S>1360</S> thy<S>4675</S> prayer<S>1162</S> is heard<S>1522</S>; and<S>2532</S> thy<S>4675</S> wife<S>1135</S> Elisabeth<S>1665</S> shall bear<S>1080</S> thee<S>4671</S> a son<S>5207</S>, and<S>2532</S> thou shalt call<S>2564</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> John<S>2491</S>.
And<S>2532</S> thou<S>4671</S> shalt have<S>2071</S> joy<S>5479</S> and<S>2532</S> gladness<S>20</S>; and<S>2532</S> many<S>4183</S> shall rejoice<S>5463</S> at<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> birth<S>1083</S>.
For<S>1063</S> he shall be<S>2071</S> great<S>3173</S> in the sight<S>1799</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall drink<S>4095</S> neither<S>3364</S> wine<S>3631</S> nor<S>2532</S> strong drink<S>4608</S>; and<S>2532</S> he shall be filled<S>4130</S> with the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>, even<S>2089</S> from<S>1537</S> his<S>846</S> mother's<S>3384</S> womb<S>2836</S>.
And<S>2532</S> many<S>4183</S> of the children<S>5207</S> of Israel<S>2474</S> shall he turn<S>1994</S> to<S>1909</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> their<S>846</S> God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he<S>846</S> shall go<S>4281</S> before<S>1799</S> him<S>846</S> in<S>1722</S> the spirit<S>4151</S> and<S>2532</S> power<S>1411</S> of Elias<S>2243</S>, to turn<S>1994</S> the hearts<S>2588</S> of the fathers<S>3962</S> to<S>1909</S> the children<S>5043</S>, and<S>2532</S> the disobedient<S>545</S> to<S>1722</S> the wisdom<S>5428</S> of the just<S>1342</S>; to make ready<S>2090</S> a people<S>2992</S> prepared<S>2680</S> for the Lord<S>2962</S>. <sup>to the wisdom: or, by the wisdom</sup>
And<S>2532</S> Zacharias<S>2197</S> said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> the angel<S>32</S>, Whereby<S>2596</S> <S>5101</S> shall I know<S>1097</S> this<S>5124</S>? for<S>1063</S> I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> an old man<S>4246</S>, and<S>2532</S> my<S>3450</S> wife<S>1135</S> well stricken<S>4260</S> in<S>1722</S> years<S>2250</S> <S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the angel<S>32</S> answering<S>611</S> said<S>2036</S> unto him<S>846</S>, I<S>1473</S> am<S>1510</S> Gabriel<S>1043</S>, that stand<S>3936</S> in the presence<S>1799</S> of God<S>2316</S>; and<S>2532</S> am sent<S>649</S> to speak<S>2980</S> unto<S>4314</S> thee<S>4571</S>, and<S>2532</S> to shew<S>2097</S> thee<S>4671</S> these<S>5023</S> glad tidings<S>2097</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, thou<S>2071</S> shalt be dumb<S>4623</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3361</S> able<S>1410</S> to speak<S>2980</S>, until<S>891</S> the day<S>2250</S> that<S>3739</S> these things<S>5023</S> shall be performed<S>1096</S>, because<S>473</S> <S>3739</S> thou believest<S>4100</S> not<S>3756</S> my<S>3450</S> words<S>3056</S>, which<S>3748</S> shall be fulfilled<S>4137</S> in<S>1519</S> their<S>846</S> season<S>2540</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the people<S>2992</S> waited<S>2258</S> <S>4328</S> for Zacharias<S>2197</S>, and<S>2532</S> marvelled<S>2296</S> that<S>1722</S> he<S>846</S> tarried so long<S>5549</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>3485</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when he came out<S>1831</S>, he could<S>1410</S> not<S>3756</S> speak<S>2980</S> unto them<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> they perceived<S>1921</S> that<S>3754</S> he had seen<S>3708</S> a vision<S>3701</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>3485</S>: for<S>2532</S> he<S>846</S> beckoned<S>2258</S> <S>1269</S> unto them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> remained<S>1265</S> speechless<S>2974</S>.
And<S>2532</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, that, as soon as<S>5613</S> the days<S>2250</S> of his<S>846</S> ministration<S>3009</S> were accomplished<S>4130</S>, he departed<S>565</S> to<S>1519</S> his own<S>846</S> house<S>3624</S>.
And<S>1161</S> after<S>3326</S> those<S>5025</S> days<S>2250</S> his<S>846</S> wife<S>1135</S> Elisabeth<S>1665</S> conceived<S>4815</S>, and<S>2532</S> hid<S>4032</S> herself<S>1438</S> five<S>4002</S> months<S>3376</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,
<S>3754</S> Thus<S>3779</S> hath<S>4160</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> dealt<S>4160</S> with me<S>3427</S> in<S>1722</S> the days<S>2250</S> wherein<S>3739</S> he looked on<S>1896</S> me, to take away<S>851</S> my<S>3450</S> reproach<S>3681</S> among<S>1722</S> men<S>444</S>.
And<S>1161</S> in<S>1722</S> the sixth<S>1623</S> month<S>3376</S> the angel<S>32</S> Gabriel<S>1043</S> was sent<S>649</S> from<S>5259</S> God<S>2316</S> unto<S>1519</S> a city<S>4172</S> of Galilee<S>1056</S>, named<S>3739</S> <S>3686</S> Nazareth<S>3478</S>,
To<S>4314</S> a virgin<S>3933</S> espoused<S>3423</S> to a man<S>435</S> whose<S>3739</S> name<S>3686</S> was Joseph<S>2501</S>, of<S>1537</S> the house<S>3624</S> of David<S>1138</S>; and<S>2532</S> the virgin's<S>3933</S> name<S>3686</S> was Mary<S>3137</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the angel<S>32</S> came in<S>1525</S> unto<S>4314</S> her<S>846</S>, and said<S>2036</S>, Hail<S>5463</S>, thou that art highly favoured<S>5487</S>, the Lord<S>2962</S> is with<S>3326</S> thee<S>4675</S>: blessed<S>2127</S> art thou<S>4771</S> among<S>1722</S> women<S>1135</S>. <sup>highly: or, graciously accepted, or, of much grace</sup>
And<S>1161</S> when she saw<S>1492</S> him, she was troubled<S>1298</S> at<S>1909</S> his<S>846</S> saying<S>3056</S>, and<S>2532</S> cast in her mind<S>1260</S> what manner<S>4217</S> of salutation<S>783</S> this<S>3778</S> should be<S>1498</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the angel<S>32</S> said<S>2036</S> unto her<S>846</S>, Fear<S>5399</S> not<S>3361</S>, Mary<S>3137</S>: for<S>1063</S> thou hast found<S>2147</S> favour<S>5485</S> with<S>3844</S> God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, thou shalt conceive<S>4815</S> in<S>1722</S> thy womb<S>1064</S>, and<S>2532</S> bring forth<S>5088</S> a son<S>5207</S>, and<S>2532</S> shalt call<S>2564</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> JESUS<S>2424</S>.
He<S>3778</S> shall be<S>2071</S> great<S>3173</S>, and<S>2532</S> shall be called<S>2564</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of the Highest<S>5310</S>: and<S>2532</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> God<S>2316</S> shall give<S>1325</S> unto him<S>846</S> the throne<S>2362</S> of his<S>846</S> father<S>3962</S> David<S>1138</S>:
And<S>2532</S> he shall reign<S>936</S> over<S>1909</S> the house<S>3624</S> of Jacob<S>2384</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S>; and<S>2532</S> of his<S>846</S> kingdom<S>932</S> there shall be<S>2071</S> no<S>3756</S> end<S>5056</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> said<S>2036</S> Mary<S>3137</S> unto<S>4314</S> the angel<S>32</S>, How<S>4459</S> shall<S>2071</S> this<S>5124</S> be<S>2071</S>, seeing<S>1893</S> I know<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> a man<S>435</S>?
And<S>2532</S> the angel<S>32</S> answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S> unto her<S>846</S>, The Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> shall come<S>1904</S> upon<S>1909</S> thee<S>4571</S>, and<S>2532</S> the power<S>1411</S> of the Highest<S>5310</S> shall overshadow<S>1982</S> thee<S>4671</S>: therefore<S>1352</S> also<S>2532</S> that holy thing<S>40</S> which shall be born<S>1080</S> of<S>1537</S> thee<S>4675</S> shall be called<S>2564</S> the Son<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, thy<S>4675</S> cousin<S>4773</S> Elisabeth<S>1665</S>, she<S>846</S> hath<S>4815</S> also<S>2532</S> conceived<S>4815</S> a son<S>5207</S> in<S>1722</S> her<S>846</S> old age<S>1094</S>: and<S>2532</S> this<S>3778</S> is<S>2076</S> the sixth<S>1623</S> month<S>3376</S> with her<S>846</S>, who<S>3588</S> was called<S>2564</S> barren<S>4723</S>.
For<S>3754</S> with<S>3844</S> God<S>2316</S> nothing<S>3756</S> <S>3956</S> <S>4487</S> shall be impossible<S>101</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Mary<S>3137</S> said<S>2036</S>, Behold<S>2400</S> the handmaid<S>1399</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S>; be it<S>1096</S> unto me<S>3427</S> according<S>2596</S> to thy<S>4675</S> word<S>4487</S>. And<S>2532</S> the angel<S>32</S> departed<S>565</S> from<S>575</S> her<S>846</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Mary<S>3137</S> arose<S>450</S> in<S>1722</S> those<S>5025</S> days<S>2250</S>, and went<S>4198</S> into<S>1519</S> the hill country<S>3714</S> with<S>3326</S> haste<S>4710</S>, into<S>1519</S> a city<S>4172</S> of Juda<S>2448</S>;
And<S>2532</S> entered<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the house<S>3624</S> of Zacharias<S>2197</S>, and<S>2532</S> saluted<S>782</S> Elisabeth<S>1665</S>.
And<S>2532</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, that, when<S>5613</S> Elisabeth<S>1665</S> heard<S>191</S> the salutation<S>783</S> of Mary<S>3137</S>, the babe<S>1025</S> leaped<S>4640</S> in<S>1722</S> her<S>846</S> womb<S>2836</S>; and<S>2532</S> Elisabeth<S>1665</S> was filled<S>4130</S> with the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>:
And<S>2532</S> she spake out<S>400</S> with a loud<S>3173</S> voice<S>5456</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, Blessed<S>2127</S> art thou<S>4771</S> among<S>1722</S> women<S>1135</S>, and<S>2532</S> blessed<S>2127</S> is the fruit<S>2590</S> of thy<S>4675</S> womb<S>2836</S>.
And<S>2532</S> whence<S>4159</S> is this<S>5124</S> to me<S>3427</S>, that<S>2443</S> the mother<S>3384</S> of my<S>3450</S> Lord<S>2962</S> should come<S>2064</S> to<S>4314</S> me<S>3165</S>?
For<S>1063</S>, lo<S>2400</S>, as soon as<S>5613</S> the voice<S>5456</S> of thy<S>4675</S> salutation<S>783</S> sounded<S>1096</S> in<S>1519</S> mine<S>3450</S> ears<S>3775</S>, the babe<S>1025</S> leaped<S>4640</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> womb<S>2836</S> for<S>1722</S> joy<S>20</S>.
And<S>2532</S> blessed<S>3107</S> is she that believed<S>4100</S>: for<S>3754</S> there shall be<S>2071</S> a performance<S>5050</S> of those things which were told<S>2980</S> her<S>846</S> from<S>3844</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>. <sup>that: or, which believed that there</sup>
And<S>2532</S> Mary<S>3137</S> said<S>2036</S>, My<S>3450</S> soul<S>5590</S> doth magnify<S>3170</S> the Lord<S>2962</S>,
And<S>2532</S> my<S>3450</S> spirit<S>4151</S> hath rejoiced<S>21</S> in<S>1909</S> God<S>2316</S> my<S>3450</S> Saviour<S>4990</S>.
For<S>3754</S> he hath regarded<S>1914</S> <S>1909</S> the low estate<S>5014</S> of his<S>846</S> handmaiden<S>1399</S>: for<S>1063</S>, behold<S>2400</S>, from<S>575</S> henceforth<S>3568</S> all<S>3956</S> generations<S>1074</S> shall call<S>3106</S> me<S>3165</S> blessed<S>3106</S>.
For<S>3754</S> he that is mighty<S>1415</S> hath done<S>4160</S> to me<S>3427</S> great things<S>3167</S>; and<S>2532</S> holy<S>40</S> is his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S>.
And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> mercy<S>1656</S> is on them that fear<S>5399</S> him<S>846</S> from<S>1519</S> generation<S>1074</S> to generation<S>1074</S>.
He hath shewed<S>4160</S> strength<S>2904</S> with<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> arm<S>1023</S>; he hath scattered<S>1287</S> the proud<S>5244</S> in the imagination<S>1271</S> of their<S>846</S> hearts<S>2588</S>.
He hath put down<S>2507</S> the mighty<S>1413</S> from<S>575</S> their seats<S>2362</S>, and<S>2532</S> exalted<S>5312</S> them of low degree<S>5011</S>.
He hath filled<S>1705</S> the hungry<S>3983</S> with good things<S>18</S>; and<S>2532</S> the rich<S>4147</S> he hath sent<S>1821</S> empty<S>2756</S> away<S>1821</S>.
He hath holpen<S>482</S> his<S>846</S> servant<S>3816</S> Israel<S>2474</S>, in remembrance<S>3415</S> of his mercy<S>1656</S>;
As<S>2531</S> he spake<S>2980</S> to<S>4314</S> our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S>, to Abraham<S>11</S>, and<S>2532</S> to his<S>846</S> seed<S>4690</S> for<S>1519</S> ever<S>165</S>.
And<S>1161</S> Mary<S>3137</S> abode<S>3306</S> with<S>4862</S> her<S>846</S> about<S>5616</S> three<S>5140</S> months<S>3376</S>, and<S>2532</S> returned<S>5290</S> to<S>1519</S> her own<S>846</S> house<S>3624</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> Elisabeth's<S>1665</S> full<S>4130</S> time<S>5550</S> came<S>4130</S> that she<S>846</S> should be delivered<S>5088</S>; and<S>2532</S> she brought forth<S>1080</S> a son<S>5207</S>.
And<S>2532</S> her neighbours<S>4040</S> and<S>2532</S> her<S>846</S> cousins<S>4773</S> heard<S>191</S> how<S>3754</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> had shewed great<S>3170</S> mercy<S>1656</S> <S>846</S> upon<S>3326</S> her<S>846</S>; and<S>2532</S> they rejoiced<S>4796</S> with her<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, that on<S>1722</S> the eighth<S>3590</S> day<S>2250</S> they came<S>2064</S> to circumcise<S>4059</S> the child<S>3813</S>; and<S>2532</S> they called<S>2564</S> him<S>846</S> Zacharias<S>2197</S>, after<S>1909</S> the name<S>3686</S> of his<S>846</S> father<S>3962</S>.
And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> mother<S>3384</S> answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S>, Not<S>3780</S> so; but<S>235</S> he shall be called<S>2564</S> John<S>2491</S>.
And<S>2532</S> they said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> her<S>846</S>,<S>3754</S> There is<S>2076</S> none<S>3762</S> of<S>1722</S> thy<S>4675</S> kindred<S>4772</S> that<S>3739</S> is called<S>2564</S> by this<S>5129</S> name<S>3686</S>.
And<S>1161</S> they made signs<S>1770</S> to his<S>846</S> father<S>3962</S>, how<S>5101</S> <S>302</S> he would have<S>2309</S> him<S>846</S> called<S>2564</S>.
And<S>2532</S> he asked for<S>154</S> a writing table<S>4093</S>, and wrote<S>1125</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, His<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> is<S>2076</S> John<S>2491</S>. And<S>2532</S> they marvelled<S>2296</S> all<S>3956</S>.
And<S>1161</S> his<S>846</S> mouth<S>4750</S> was opened<S>455</S> immediately<S>3916</S>, and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> tongue<S>1100</S> loosed, and<S>2532</S> he spake<S>2980</S>, and praised<S>2127</S> God<S>2316</S>.
And<S>2532</S> fear<S>5401</S> came<S>1096</S> on<S>1909</S> all<S>3956</S> that dwelt round about<S>4039</S> them<S>846</S>: and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> these<S>5023</S> sayings<S>4487</S> were noised abroad<S>1255</S> throughout<S>1722</S> all<S>3650</S> the hill country<S>3714</S> of Judaea<S>2449</S>. <sup>sayings: or, things</sup>
And<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> they that heard<S>191</S> them laid them up<S>5087</S> in<S>1722</S> their<S>846</S> hearts<S>2588</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, What<S>5101</S> manner<S>686</S> of child<S>3813</S> shall<S>2071</S> this<S>5124</S> be<S>2071</S>! And<S>2532</S> the hand<S>5495</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> was<S>2258</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>.
And<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> father<S>3962</S> Zacharias<S>2197</S> was filled<S>4130</S> with the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>, and<S>2532</S> prophesied<S>4395</S>, saying<S>3004</S>,
Blessed<S>2128</S> be the Lord<S>2962</S> God<S>2316</S> of Israel<S>2474</S>; for<S>3754</S> he hath visited<S>1980</S> and<S>2532</S> redeemed<S>3085</S> his<S>846</S> people<S>2992</S> <S>4160</S>,
And<S>2532</S> hath raised up<S>1453</S> an horn<S>2768</S> of salvation<S>4991</S> for us<S>2254</S> in<S>1722</S> the house<S>3624</S> of his<S>846</S> servant<S>3816</S> David<S>1138</S>;
As<S>2531</S> he spake<S>2980</S> by<S>1223</S> the mouth<S>4750</S> of his<S>846</S> holy<S>40</S> prophets<S>4396</S>, which<S>3588</S> have been since<S>575</S> the world began<S>165</S>:
That we should be saved<S>4991</S> from<S>1537</S> our<S>2257</S> enemies<S>2190</S>, and<S>2532</S> from<S>1537</S> the hand<S>5495</S> of all<S>3956</S> that hate<S>3404</S> us<S>2248</S>;
To perform<S>4160</S> the mercy<S>1656</S> promised to<S>3326</S> our<S>2257</S> fathers<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> to remember<S>3415</S> his<S>846</S> holy<S>40</S> covenant<S>1242</S>;
The oath<S>3727</S> which<S>3739</S> he sware<S>3660</S> to<S>4314</S> our<S>2257</S> father<S>3962</S> Abraham<S>11</S>,
That he would grant<S>1325</S> unto us<S>2254</S>, that we being delivered<S>4506</S> out of<S>1537</S> the hand<S>5495</S> of our<S>2257</S> enemies<S>2190</S> might serve<S>3000</S> him<S>846</S> without fear<S>870</S>,
In<S>1722</S> holiness<S>3742</S> and<S>2532</S> righteousness<S>1343</S> before<S>1799</S> him<S>846</S>, all<S>3956</S> the days<S>2250</S> of our<S>2257</S> life<S>2222</S>.
And<S>2532</S> thou<S>4771</S>, child<S>3813</S>, shalt be called<S>2564</S> the prophet<S>4396</S> of the Highest<S>5310</S>: for<S>1063</S> thou shalt go<S>4313</S> before<S>4253</S> the face<S>4383</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> to prepare<S>2090</S> his<S>846</S> ways<S>3598</S>;
To give<S>1325</S> knowledge<S>1108</S> of salvation<S>4991</S> unto his<S>846</S> people<S>2992</S> by<S>1722</S> the remission<S>859</S> of their<S>846</S> sins<S>266</S>, <sup>by: or, for</sup>
Through<S>1223</S> the tender<S>4698</S> mercy<S>1656</S> of our<S>2257</S> God<S>2316</S>; whereby<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> the dayspring<S>395</S> from<S>1537</S> on high<S>5311</S> hath visited<S>1980</S> us<S>2248</S>, <sup>tender: or, bowels of the mercy</sup> <sup>dayspring: or, Sunrising, or, branch, Zac.3.8, esay II, I Malich.4.2, numb.24.17</sup>
To give light<S>2014</S> to them that sit<S>2521</S> in<S>1722</S> darkness<S>4655</S> and<S>2532</S> in the shadow<S>4639</S> of death<S>2288</S>, to guide<S>2720</S> our<S>2257</S> feet<S>4228</S> into<S>1519</S> the way<S>3598</S> of peace<S>1515</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the child<S>3813</S> grew<S>837</S>, and<S>2532</S> waxed strong<S>2901</S> in spirit<S>4151</S>, and<S>2532</S> was<S>2258</S> in<S>1722</S> the deserts<S>2048</S> till<S>2193</S> the day<S>2250</S> of his<S>846</S> shewing<S>323</S> unto<S>4314</S> Israel<S>2474</S>.
